attributes.action: Any politician who has made a false or unsupportable claim for allowances should be prosecuted under the Proceeds of Crome Act and Criminal Justice Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All false claims should be submitted to CPS to determine whether a prosecution should proceed under Criminal Justice Act and Proceeds of Crime Act. The Politician should be treated no less favourably than an ordinary citizen. Alternatively, the citizen should be treated in the more favourable and lenient manner that culpable politicians are currently being treated, namely, subjected to nothing more than mild censure on the basis that they make restitution of any ill-gotten "gains" (but without fine, penalty or confiscation). In other words each and every citizen, be they ever so mighty or ever so humble, should be treated equally before the Law.

rejection.details: The PM and Government can not prosecute individuals. This is a matter of the police and courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
